name: Vanilla Network
public_notice: Vanilla Network has migrated from the old contract to a new one. Read more here.

description.en: The Vanilla Network is a deflationary ERC-20 token with decentralized finance at the heart of its ecosystem driven by Blockchain technology. The premise of this project is to produce award winning staking and betting decentralized applications (dApps) that appeal to all betting enthusiasts and those seeking rewards for long-term participation.
